pullRequest.title: [KOGITO-1248] Align hierarchy
pullRequest.bodyText:
Follow up on PR #416

Factories are now more similar to the Nodes hierarchy allowing more re-usability and the implementation of missing methods.
Hard-coded method names and meta data fields have been moved to constants.
Introduced the ProcessVisitor class that extends AbstractVisitor, all other NodeVisitors extend now AbstractNodeVisitor
Introduced addFactoryNameMethod and addFactoryDoneMethod methods for simplification.
NodeVisitors now have the NODE_KEY constant and getNodeKey() method to reduce hard-coded literals
